com.example.painintheass

Class MapActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.painintheass.MapActivity

  • public class MapActivity
extends Activity
    This Activity is responsible for handling the initialization of the classes related to the map as well as the save/load processes and the different return or pause states of the activity. Classes initialized include the UI manager and its extensive list of widgets, the World and its countries, the view, and the victory states.

    • Method Detail

      • initWorld

        public void initWorld(MapUIManager myUIM,
                      Country[] World,
                      Button[] Countries)
        Creates the UIManager's World and its countries. Associates each country to his respective button.
        Parameters:
        myUIM - The MapUIManager
        World - An empty Country array to be filled.
        Countries - An array of Buttons filled with each Country's button

      • initMap

        public void initMap(int width,

        Parameters:

        height - Height of the screen
        myUIM - The Map's UIManager
        World - A Country array
